name: Roadway Surfers
description:
An endless-runner made for the 207th Trijam game jam
The theme of the jam is Run towards the danger

Tip: Don't be too afraid of obstacles, just look out for other vehicles.

Fancy tip: Try changing the design of your car.

Controls Move, Change car (home screen)A-D & LEFT-RIGHTTurn the radio on/ off (driving)RSkip screenENTER/ SPACE Development

Made in slightly more than 3 hours hands-on-keyboard time

  • Engine: Godot
  • Art: https://grafxkid.itch.io/mini-pixel-pack-2 (customized)
  • Music & sound design by myself.
Credits

Highway and Desert graphics by Devurandom

opengameart.org/users/devurandom

Have fun!
